key_risks: Securities fraud investigations by multiple law firms
Insider trading charges against former Controller
Downbeat earnings and downward revisions in earnings forecasts
Vulnerability to global supply chain disruptions
Cybersecurity risks in IoT-enabled security solutions
Intense competition in the security industry
Dependence on cyclical construction and real estate markets
environmental_issues: Focus on developing energy-efficient and environmentally friendly products
governance_issues: Insider trading charges raising concerns about internal governance and compliance practices
